name: Pogemon 2 (The first one broke)
description:
It's a parkour map where the player (controlled by keyboard or controller) goes around the map and jumps onto platforms by either using their new gained abilities or navigating through hoops as the final challenge of the map.

If the level is passed,  you can move onto the 2nd level where an enemy will be chasing you and if it catches you then you will take damage. Before it catches you, collect the statues and reach level 10 to finish and win the game.... Otherwise, back to the parkour map you go.

Controls:

Playable with Keyboard & Mouse or Controller. Instructions on how to play in the game.
